Specimen Type: Sputum, bronchoalveolar lavage (BAL), tissue biopsies, cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), pleural fluid, other clinical samples
Purpose: To identify Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex species rapidly and accurately using PCR for patient diagnosis and management.
Equipment: Biosafety cabinet Level II, real-time PCR machine, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, thermal cycler, pipettes with sterile tips, sterile microcentrifuge tubes
